long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decrypt your encrypted .env files directly on GitHub.

The extension provides the ability to decrypt your encrypted .env files while browsing them on GitHub. You can enter your private key in the configuration modal and then toggle encrypted/decrypted values while viewing your .env file.

If you are unfamiliar with encrypted .env files, you can use dotenvx - https://github.com/dotenvx/dotenvx - to generate them. Use that dotevnx cli tool to encrypt your .env files and push them to GitHub. Then use this chrome plugin to decrypt them while browsing them on GitHub.

Thanks for using dotenvx. Keep your secrets safe.
